body_html: The code is fine. The question is whether we should allow buffers to grow infinitely. Ideally, a buffer should shrink if the current size is unnecessarily large. But I could not think a case where a certain tensor size is ephemeral, i.e. one will likely see the tensor of the same size in the future training steps.
